pkgmetadata.longdescription: pytest-peach============pytest-peach is a plugin for `py.test <http://pytest.org>`_ that integrates with`Peach API Security <https://peach.tech>`_. Integration includes calling thecorrect Peach API Security APIs to report test names and not fuzzing setup and teardown requests.Requirements------------You will need the following prerequisites in order to use pytest-peach:- Python 2.6, 2.7, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5 or PyPy- py.test 2.8 or newer- Requests v2.11 or newerInstallation------------To install pytest-peach:$ pip install pytest-peach**From Source**$ python setup.py installUsage-----The integration is intended to be run from CI integrations such as thegeneric CI runner.Several environmental variables are expected to have been set: - PEACH_API - PEACH_API_TOKEN - PEACH_SESSIONID - PEACH_PROXY$ pytest --peach=on test_target.pyArguments---------**--peach=on** This argument enables the pytest Peach API Security extention.
